title: Can you name a band who's name ends with 'B'? - Quora

response.answer_text: Does the world really need to know the answer to this question but it’s a list question linking some great but otherwise totally unconnected bands. And no cheating, it’s not solo stars or any of the following acts that end in “s”. The Dirtbombs - 90s Detroit Garage rockThe Honeycombs - 60s Joe Meek produced pop band with Honey Lantree on DrumsThe Cribs - 00s UK indie rockBut it is these faB bands; Stereolab - influential experimental French/English 90s dialectical indie rock band Nova Mob - Shortlived band formed by drummer/songwriter/singer Grant Hart (RIP) a while after he left seminal (in my house) 80s post Hardcore group Hüsker Dü. Admiral of the Sea The Orb - 90s Dance chill Little Fluffy Clouds has a Rickie Lee Jones vocal sample that you’ll either like or drive you bonkers Culture Club - Do you really want to hurt me?Tom Tom Club - Much sampled Talking Heads side project.
Here’s a few Black Sabbath, Blue Oyster Cult, Blind Melon, Bad Religion, Beatles, Blondie, Bon Jovi, Boston, Britny Fox, Breaking Benjamin, Buckcherry and there’s a lot more.
